snippet.title: EECS 494: Troubled Waters Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer for our EECS 494 game, Troubled Waters.

Troubled Waters is a 2D Top-Down Shooter adventure game where players take control of a ship and set sail - fighting pirates, managing your crew, and exploring islands during the Golden Age of Piracy.

Find it here on itch.io: https://kiptoke.itch.io/troubled-waters
